CAWL.connectionTitle: Configure your API keys below. If you don't have an account, you can create new one here.

logo.description: The logo that will appear next to CAWL payment method on checkout page. Allowed image format is png, jpg and jpeg.

accountSettings.description: Manage your CAWL account API preferences and configurations.

enable.description: With our Pay By Link feature you can send a payment to your customers if they do not complete the payment on CAWL during checkout process or if you wish to create an order for a customer through the shop back-office and then send a payment link to the customer.

disconnect.description: To connect a different CAWL account or disconnect from this store, click the Disconnect button below.

logs.description: Here you can review all sent requests and received responses from CAWL system.

webhooks.description: Here you can review payment webhooks received and their processing status from CAWL system.
